anxious.title: ü´Ä Open when if you feel anxious
anxious.content:
Your browser does not support the audio element.
  
  


  p {
    font-family: Georgia, serif;
    font-size: 16px;
    line-height: 1.6;
  }

Hello Konnie!

I know breathing sucks right now. So, let‚Äôs not focus on that. Where are you right now? Tell me five things you can see around you. You can write them down if you want to, but I‚Äôll remember them anyway.
1.2.3.4.5.


Those are some unique details. How does it feel to be in this place? What four things can you feel right now with your sense of touch? What do you feel on your skin and in your body?
1.2.3.4.


That‚Äôs a hefty load of feelings. I see why it‚Äôs causing you some stress. Are you alone here? What three things can you hear around you?
1.2.3.


I don‚Äôt like hearing very much, and hearing three things at once must feel crazy on you. Do you have headphones? I hope you have your hands anyway. It helps me to hide myself behind them, so it may help you to cover your ears. Your hands may help you cover your nose as well if you smell something foul. What two things can you smell right now?
1.2.


That‚Äôs a lot of feelings overall, I don‚Äôt blame you for getting agitated over them. Does it feel like they leave bad taste in your mouth? It helps to have a mint around to wash the taste off. What one thing can you taste right now?
1.


I‚Äôm glad you bore with me through these. Keep bearing, and I‚Äôll bear with you.


Are you ready to be back? The journey is draining and tiresome. When I return home from a long day, I always drink some water. Can you take three sips? One‚Äìtwo‚Äìthree. It‚Äôs great to see you going.


I don‚Äôt like the outside much; it can be cold out there. Are you cold? Can you rub your hands two times? One‚Äìtwo. I imagine the fire in you getting brighter.


When I finally get to safety, I know I can relax. Can you exhale deeply once? One.

Welcome home.
Yours,Milligan

birthday-messages/from-kusi.title: üíú A letter from Kusi
birthday-messages/from-kusi.content:
Hey, hon. üíå
  It's been a long journey for you and me. But wow, we made it and oh boy did we have some fun. I feel like I've said a million things millions of times ‚Äî once more won't hurt though.
  I'm proud of you. Of who you are, of who you were, of who you will be. No matter what, we will try and be together and fight this bitch of a world.
  You're amazing just as you are. You are funny, intelligent, sexy, caring and gentle. You can do anything you set your mind to. I believe in you. And all of your amazing friends believe in you too. Now it's your turn.
  I love you.
  p.s. I'm no WebDev but I hope you like this site.
  hugs and kisses,Kusi


  
    
    Your browser does not support the video tag.
  
  üé• A special video message from Kusi

eat-cat.title: üêà Open when you want to eat a cat (don't do that)
eat-cat.content:
First of all, hi!
I believe you're in a strange place right now: thinking that eating your family's cat might resolve all your problems. Or you just feel like an alien.
It can feel rather weird to live in a world that forbids such a natural thing ‚Äî to feed on cats. Maybe someday the human race will adapt to your needs and tolerate every type of diet, appearance, behaviour, and the Earth will become a better place for harmless aliens.
For now, please consider not eating Klava, she's a nice cat. 
‚Äî Vasilisa

index.title: üíå Start here
index.content:
Welcome to your little corner of love and friendship.
This is your space ‚Äî open it when you need a smile, a reminder, or a spark ‚ú®
Click on any of the cards in the sidebar depending on how you feel today. But first‚Ä¶

üéâ Open when it‚Äôs your birthday

üí¨ You are loved. You are never alone. We‚Äôre always with you ‚Äî even across oceans.

motivation.title: ‚ú® Open when you need motivation
motivation.content:
Hey 
Do you also feel a bit off? üëÄ
Lemme share something about how I feel now.
Well, not gonna lie but I LITERALLY FEEL LIKE SHIT üí©
Yes I do, and don‚Äôt know what to do about it, as I fight it, it becomes even MORE shittier üí©üí©
But then I tried to not fight it, rather experience and just letting go, without overthinking any bit of it. Yes, I lost my motivation, so what? What‚Äôs wrong with that. Honestly, nothing, and it would be strange to have an ongoing crazy motivation for 24/7 for the rest of our lives‚Ä¶. Kinda boring, no drama üíÖüèº
But oh that motivation‚Ä¶ it is such an overused word, isn‚Äôt it? I think it should be replaced with inspiration. In a world where there is so much noise and distraction, we need to clear our thoughts for our dreams and get inspired to gain energy to realize those dreams; as Avicii said ‚Äúone day you will live this world behind, so live a life you will remember‚Äù üèÑ‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è‚òÄÔ∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•
La vida es una y es una CARNAVAL! üéâ
After all, we forget that today, now, right at this moment, someone young is lying on their deathbed wishing they would have our health to live more and experience life fully. There is a guy in a wheelchair now saying that ‚Äúyou have the best life, just because you can walk, I would go for a walk and move my body in every chance I have‚Äù. A blind girl says ‚ÄúI wish I could see my favorite thing again, I envy you, people‚Äù. A deaf child who says ‚ÄúI wish to be able to listen to music again‚Äù.
These people are limited by one thing, their fate, but not we, WE are the ones who limit ourselves, how ironic. So, how about letting you SHINE bright like a diamond, do one of the coolest things, which is being yourself and just get into your creative flow where you do what you LOVE üíéüòéüå∏
If there is grief to be grieved or sadness to be felt, we need to feel all these emotions. It‚Äôs okay, WE ALL feel like that, in fact very often, the most common human experience that unites us; and slowing down, (maybe crying a bit, why not) it is needed for our soul, just like autumn needs rain and a year needs all the different seasons, as without them life would have been pretty dull, right? In the end its the combination of all the seasons that make up such a beautiful colors üçÉ‚òÄÔ∏èüçÇ‚õàÔ∏è‚ùÑÔ∏è
Feel your emotions, take your time, and when you are ready (jk, you will never be ready, JUMP) as Fitzgerald said ‚ÄúJust take a deep breath, pick yourself up, dust yourself off, and start all over again‚Äù ‚ú®üéµüé∑
 (c) Arine 

  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  
  


  
    
    ‚Äî Danya
  
  
    
    ‚Äî Danya
  
  
  
    
     ‚Äî Ivana
  
  
  
    
     ‚Äî Kusi

sad.title: üå® Open when you feel sad
sad.content:
Hey, it's okay to feel heavy sometimes. You don't have to pretend.  
    If I could give you a hug right now, I would.  
    But this page is my hug ‚Äî full of warmth, softness, and reminders that you matter.  
    
    You are not alone üíô

too-much.title: üåÄ Open when everything feels too much
too-much.content:
Hey. It‚Äôs okay to feel overwhelmed.
  You‚Äôve made it through 100% of your worst days so far ‚Äî and that‚Äôs not nothing.
  Maybe today isn‚Äôt about fixing everything. Maybe today is about breathing, and letting yourself be exactly where you are.


  
  
   
    –†–∞—Å—Å–ª–∞–±–ª—è—é—â–∞—è –º—É–∑—ã–∫–∞, –∫–æ–≥–¥–∞ –Ω—É–∂–Ω–æ –≤—Ä–µ–º—è, –æ—Ç–æ–π—Ç–∏ –æ—Ç –¥–µ–ª –∏ –ø—Ä–∏–π—Ç–∏ –≤ —Å–µ–±—è‚Äî –ö–æ–ª—è
  


    
    ‚Äî Danya
  
  
    
     ‚Äî Danya 
  

‚úÖ You can try this:

drink a glass of water
breathe in for 4, hold for 4, out for 6
put on your comfiest clothes
hug your blanket or pillow
text someone who makes you laugh
write down 3 things you don‚Äôt have to do today
remind yourself: this moment will pass üíõ


 
  
    
  
  
    
  

‚ú® ‚Äî Ivana
